name: Guardia Real
description:
My name is Robson Clecio and I am a visual artist from Brazil. I was born and live in the city of Guarulhos. I graduated in Visual Arts in 2005, I worked as an educator in institutions such as Pinacoteca do Estado and Fundação Bienal de São Paulo.
I also participated in some group exhibitions, the most important ones being at Colorida Gallery, Portugal and Tokyo International Art Fair, in Tokyo.
